data.title: Need help with Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time? :: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time General Discussions
data.meta_description: Have you witnessed any bugs, has your game crashed or are you experiencing some performance issues with the game? Please use Steam's 'Search Discussions' search box, to first look for other player threads about the same issue. We will often mark threads with a blue tick check mark to show an answer was found in that thread, that resolves that particular issue.
data.text:
Need help with Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time?

Have you witnessed any bugs, has your game crashed or are you experiencing some performance issues with the game?

Please use Steam's 'Search Discussions' search box, to first look for other player threads about the same issue. We will often mark threads with a blue tick check mark to show an answer was found in that thread, that resolves that particular issue.

On our Ubisoft Support website, we have a helpful guide explaining what troubleshooting steps you can perform for various crashes, performance issues, installation and download issues here -

https://www.ubisoft.com/help?article=000061047

We also have other self help guides you can find by searching for your game title on our Ubisoft Support website, here -

https://www.ubisoft.com/help

Save File locations:

SteamLibrary\Prince of Persia The Sands of Time\Profiles

Settings File locations:

SteamLibrary\Prince of Persia The Sands of Time\Hardware.ini

Original game manual:

https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/13600/manuals/manual_english.pdf?t=1447351278

If you can not find the answer in the forum, or perhaps you need help with your Ubisoft Account or game activations, you can always contact us via our other support channels too, here, where we will aim to get back to you within 48 hours if possible.

Ubisoft Support website/Live Chat - https://www.ubisoft.com/help

Twitter Support - https://twitter.com/UbisoftSupport

Facebook Support - https://www.facebook.com/UbisoftSupportUK/

-Ubisoft Support
